ygData.subject: Problems with ARFrontier
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi All, Currently I m working with ARFrontier, trying to estimate the accordance of it s functionality for my needs. I ve encountered following problem.

Hi All,

Currently I'm working with ARFrontier, trying to estimate the 
acc=
ordance of it's functionality for my needs. 

I've encountered following pr=
oblem. Suppose we're working with single 
site having static content. After=
 the first cycle of crawling is 
finished, during the second one all links =
are correctly determined as 
duplicates. But beginning from the third cycle=
 all links are being 
fully processed and content stored, although hashcode=
 for them 
remains the same!

Here is fragment from crawl.log, referring to=
 the same url:

2007-01-26T14:17:03.294Z 200 32222 http://i-teco.ru/product=
s.html 
6KDDVV5JAAPU25H22RPWTR3YHWDC67VK - wt:60s0ms,1vis,1ver,ov:33s334ms
=
2007-01-26T14:18:09.945Z 200 32222 http://i-teco.ru/products.html 
6KDDVV5J=
AAPU25H22RPWTR3YHWDC67VK - 
unchanged,wt:1m30s0ms,2vis,1ver,ov:6s464ms
2007=
-01-26T14:19:40.132Z 200 32222 http://i-teco.ru/products.html 
6KDDVV5JAAPU=
25H22RPWTR3YHWDC67VK - wt:2m15s0ms,3vis,1ver,ov:0ms
2007-01-26T14:21:55.413=
Z 200 32222 http://i-teco.ru/products.html 
6KDDVV5JAAPU25H22RPWTR3YHWDC67V=
K - wt:3m22s500ms,4vis,1ver,ov:46ms
2007-01-26T14:25:18.106Z 200 32222 http=
://i-teco.ru/products.html 
6KDDVV5JAAPU25H22RPWTR3YHWDC67VK - wt:5m3s750ms=
,5vis,1ver,ov:5ms
2007-01-26T14:30:22.109Z 200 32222 http://i-teco.ru/produ=
cts.html 
6KDDVV5JAAPU25H22RPWTR3YHWDC67VK - wt:7m35s625ms,6vis,1ver,ov:3ms=

2007-01-26T14:37:58.071Z 200 32222 http://i-teco.ru/products.html 
6KDDVV5=
JAAPU25H22RPWTR3YHWDC67VK - wt:11m23s437ms,7vis,1ver,ov:9ms

So hash code s=
eems to be correctly computed, time increasing 
according to 1.5 factor, bu=
t why these documents are not considered 
as unchanged then? In proccessing=
 chain I use ChangeEvaluator and 
WaitEvaluator.

The other problem, that I=
 can't find solution, occured while using 
HTTPMidFetchUnhangedFilter. HTTP=
 headers are stored in ARC file both 
for downloaded and filtered urls, thu=
s steadily increasing its size. 
How it can be avoided?

I use Heritrix 1.1=
0.2 running on WinXP SP2.

Thank you in advance!

Anton.
